partner.title: Trusted by the best in the business
partner.message: We are the only HK-based STEAM programme aligned with international curricula

intro.title: About
intro.subtitle: Supporting You With What Matters Most
intro.description: Semtron offers personalized STEAM course content, delivering top-notch and all-encompassing instruction that fosters students' creativity and technological aptitude. From designing teaching materials to providing expert instructors, competition guidance, hardware procurement, and post-sales support, Semtron takes care of every aspect to assist customers in delivering the finest teaching content to their students.

category.content1: Reconfigurable integrated circuit with logic blocks and interconnects, programmable after manufacturing, offering flexibility, high performance, and customization for various applications.
category.content2: Printed Circuit Board, a flat board made of non-conductive material with conductive pathways etched or printed on it, used to connect and support electronic components in various devices and systems.

connect.title: Explore with us
connect.message2: We tailor the course to meet your specific requirements.
